_sText: This is the "second" smaller version from my first zombie map: zm_citylife (big) it have 64 spawns, 12 nice defend spots, secret rooms, secret teleports and more. If you put this map on your server, please tell me the IP adress maybe in the comment here, so i can take a look on your server :] other people who play at their own: extract the ZIP file, put the BSP file into: Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps special thanks to people are listed above, they always helped me very well :] thanks for playin'! ZM Citylife NoCave: Map without cave, more spots on the level and fixed some other bugs and glitches. Download link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NRWKH6Z0
